mapper.select: select * from speise order by name
mapper.insert: insert into speise (name, beschreibung, art, bild_id, im_sortiment_ab, im_sortiment_bis, preis, lagerstand) values (#{name}, #{beschreibung}, #{art}, #{bildId}, #{imSortimentAb}, #{imSortimentBis}, #{preis}, #{lagerstand})
mapper.update: update speise set name = #{name}, beschreibung = #{beschreibung}, art = #{art}, im_sortiment_ab = #{imSortimentAb}, im_sortiment_bis = #{imSortimentBis}, preis = #{preis}, lagerstand = #{lagerstand} where id = #{id}
